  • Method Details

    • resetGameView

      public void resetGameView()
      Resets the game view. This method is called when the player completes a level or when the game view is closed.

    • resetView

      public void resetView()
      Resets the view. This method is called when the player completes a level or when the game view is closed.

    • clearHUD

      public void clearHUD()
      clears the HUD. This method is called when the player completes a level or when the game view is closed.

    • slowlyAppearHUD

      public void slowlyAppearHUD()
      Method that make the HUD slowly appear. This method is called when the game view is first loaded or when the game view is reset.

    • slideInTilemapFromBelow

      public void slideInTilemapFromBelow()
      method that makes the TileMap slide in from below the screen.
